mapper.select: SELECT OFFER_INST_ID offerInstId, OFFER_ID offerId, OFFER_TYPE offerType, OWNER_CUST_ID ownerCustId, EFF_DATE effDate, EXP_DATE expDate, OFFER_AGREE_ID offerAgreeId, CREATE_ORG_ID createOrgId, EXP_PROC_METHOD expProcMethod, LAN_ID lanId, REGION_ID regionId, STATUS_CD statusCd, CREATE_STAFF createStaff, UPDATE_STAFF updateStaff, CREATE_DATE createDate, STATUS_DATE statusDate, UPDATE_DATE updateDate, BUSI_MOD_DATE busiModDate, LAST_ORDER_ITEM_ID lastOrderItemId, REMARK remark, EXT_OFFER_INST_ID extOfferInstId, ROUTE_ID routeId FROM OFFER_inst WHERE OFFER_inst_id = #{offerInstId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and route_id = #{routeId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT(PA.OFFER_INST_ID) offerInstId FROM OFFER_INST PA,OFFER_OBJ_INST_REL PB WHERE PA.OFFER_INST_ID=PB.OFFER_INST_ID and PB.OBJ_ID = #{prodInstId}

SELECT OFFER_OBJ_INST_REL_ID offerObjInstRelId, OFFER_INST_ID offerInstId, OBJ_TYPE ObjType, OBJ_ID objId, OFFER_OBJ_REL_ID offerObjRelId, ROLE_ID roleId, EFF_DATE effDate, EXP_DATE expDate, STATUS_CD statusCd, CREATE_STAFF createStaff, UPDATE_STAFF updateStaff, CREATE_DATE createDate, STATUS_DATE statusDate, UPDATE_DATE updateDate, LAST_ORDER_ITEM_ID lastOrderItemId, REMARK remark, ROUTE_ID routeId FROM OFFER_OBJ_inst_REL WHERE OBJ_ID = #{objId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and route_id = #{routeId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and EXP_DATE > now()
